CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: iOS Web enrollment
CurrentVersion.description: Apple's device enrollment is the most common form of enrollment for BYO.  This has relied on our Company Portal app but that added extra auth prompts, app downloads, and steps.  Web Enrollment is our new streamlined BYO enrollment flow.  Leveraging JIT-registration, web enrollment is a fast and easy way for users to get productive securely.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: iOS Web enrollment
OldVersion.description: Apple's device enrollment is the most common form of enrollment for BYO.  This has relied on our Company Portal app but that added extra auth prompts, app downloads, and steps.  Web Enrollment is our new streamlined BYO enrollment flow.  Leveraging JIT-registration, web enrollment is a fast and easy way for users to get productive securely.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Scope the administration of retention and retention label policies (U.S. government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: Organizations can leverage Administrative Units in Azure Active Directory to define who can configure and manage policies in Microsoft Purview. This update will include the ability to set a Records Management admin for a specific geography, department, or other unit, who can manage retention and retention label policies for their unit.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Scope the administration of retention and retention label policies (U.S. government clouds)
OldVersion.description: Organizations can leverage Administrative Units in Azure Active Directory to define who can configure and manage policies in Microsoft Purview. This update will include the ability to set a Records Management admin for a specific geography, department, or other unit, who can manage retention and retention label policies for their unit.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Clipchamp for work
CurrentVersion.description: Clipchamp for work accounts enables rapid editing and creation of videos on OneDrive and SharePoint including features like trim, join, transitions, filters, text overlay, audio controls, screen/camera recording and more. Available via the web only for the following Microsoft 365 SKUs: Microsoft 365 E3, Microsoft 365 E5, Microsoft 365 Business Standard, and Microsoft 365 Business Premium.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Clipchamp for work
OldVersion.description: Clipchamp for work accounts enables rapid editing and creation of videos on OneDrive and SharePoint including features like trim, join, transitions, filters, text overlay, audio controls, screen/camera recording and more. Available via the web only for the following Microsoft 365 SKUs: Microsoft 365 E3, Microsoft 365 E5, Microsoft 365 Business Standard, and Microsoft 365 Business Premium.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Copilot in SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: ,Copilot in SharePoint combines the power of Large Language Models (LLMs), your data in the Microsoft Graph, and best practices to create engaging web content.? Use a brief prompt to generate custom sites and pages with content hierarchy, design, and sample content that aligns with user needs. And all within our existing commitments to data security and privacy in the enterprise.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Copilot in SharePoint
OldVersion.description: ,Copilot in SharePoint combines the power of Large Language Models (LLMs), your data in the Microsoft Graph, and best practices to create engaging web content.? Use a brief prompt to generate custom sites and pages with content hierarchy, design, and sample content that aligns with user needs. And all within our existing commitments to data security and privacy in the enterprise.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft SharePoint: Resource Specific Consent
CurrentVersion.description: Introduction of new .Selected permissions and APIs to support granting applications permissions at all of the levels where it is possible to break inheritance today. This will apply to applications operating in either delegated or app-only mode.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft SharePoint: Resource Specific Consent
OldVersion.description: Introduction of new .Selected permissions and APIs to support granting applications permissions at all of the levels where it is possible to break inheritance today. This will apply to applications operating in either delegated or app-only mode.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Application Site Creation without Sites.FullControl.All
CurrentVersion.description: Currently an application requires Sites.FullControl.All to create new site collections within a tenant. This work will allow applications to use a new scope, Sites.Create.All, to create new site collections without accessing any existing content. During the site creation process the application can request access to the new site, allowing for provisioning scenarios with reduced tenant permissions.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Application Site Creation without Sites.FullControl.All
OldVersion.description: Currently an application requires Sites.FullControl.All to create new site collections within a tenant. This work will allow applications to use a new scope, Sites.Create.All, to create new site collections without accessing any existing content. During the site creation process the application can request access to the new site, allowing for provisioning scenarios with reduced tenant permissions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Exact Data Match to support multi-token corroborative evidence
CurrentVersion.description: Exact Data Match (EDM) will support string match detection of multi-token (i.e., fields with multiple words separated by spaces or punctuation) corroborative evidence without requiring mapping Sensitive Information Types (SITs) to multi-token corroborative evidence fields.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Exact Data Match to support multi-token corroborative evidence
OldVersion.description: Exact Data Match (EDM) will support string match detection of multi-token (i.e., fields with multiple words separated by spaces or punctuation) corroborative evidence without requiring mapping Sensitive Information Types (SITs) to multi-token corroborative evidence fields.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Optical Character Recognition in OneDrive and SharePoint supports multi-page PDF and TIFF files
CurrentVersion.description: ,Currently, OCR is available only for standalone Images. With this update image-only PDF and TIFF files in OneDrive and SharePoint will also benefit from OCR.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Optical Character Recognition in OneDrive and SharePoint supports multi-page PDF and TIFF files
OldVersion.description: ,Currently, OCR is available only for standalone Images. With this update image-only PDF and TIFF files in OneDrive and SharePoint will also benefit from OCR. Note: We will not be rolling out at this time. We apologize for any inconvenience this might cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage report for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 - Early Access Program (EAP)
CurrentVersion.description: The new Microsoft 365 admin center Copilot product usage report shows enabled and active user time trends across 7/30/90/180 days. This feature is applicable only to the Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 - Early Adoption Program (EAP).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage report for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 - Early Access Program (EAP)
OldVersion.description: The new Microsoft 365 admin center Copilot product usage report shows enabled and active user time trends across 7/30/90/180 days. This feature is applicable only to the Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 - Early Adoption Program (EAP).

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New Outlook for Windows and web - Message List Selection updates
CurrentVersion.description:
In order to save space on the message list in Outlook,
we are making a UI update: From "selection circles on the left side of
each row" to a "Select mode that you have to get into before
checkboxes appear". This affects users who don't have "Sender
Images" enabled in the Message List. If you have "Sender Images"
turned on, hovering over the images will still show the checkboxes, even if you
did not get yourself into "Select Mode". To review if you have
"Send image" enabled, go to Settings/Mail/Layout and scroll to
"Sender image".

OldVersion.title: Outlook: New Outlook for Windows and web - Message List Selection updates
OldVersion.description:
In order to save space on the message list in Outlook,
we are making a UI update: From "selection circles on the left side of
each row" to a "Select mode that you have to get into before
checkboxes appear". This affects users who don't have "Sender
Images" enabled in the Message List. If you have "Sender Images"
turned on, hovering over the images will still show the checkboxes, even if you
did not get yourself into "Select Mode". To review if you have
"Send image" enabled, go to Settings/Mail/Layout and scroll to
"Sender image".

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Decorate your background (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Create more personal and engaging backgrounds by applying advanced effects. This will only be available in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Decorate your background (Premium)
OldVersion.description: Create more personal and engaging backgrounds by applying advanced effects. This will only be available in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Deploy Teams at Scale for frontline with dynamic teams.
CurrentVersion.description: ,Deploy teams at scale for your frontline workers using dynamic teams in the Teams Admin Center. Dynamic teams will automate member management to ensure your teams are always up to date. Note: We are updating a release phase to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Deploy Teams at Scale for frontline with dynamic teams.
OldVersion.description: ,Deploy teams at scale for your frontline workers using dynamic teams in the Teams Admin Center. Dynamic teams will automate member management to ensure your teams are always up to date. Note: We are updating a release phase to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: SMS Notifications in Virtual Appointments Template (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description:
External guest users will receive SMS text
notifications about their appointment, including appointment details and the
meeting join link so they can join directly from mobile. Text notifications are
sent for appointment confirmation, updates, and a reminder 15 minutes before
the appointment begins. This is available in US only at this time.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: SMS Notifications in Virtual Appointments Template (Premium)
OldVersion.description:
External guest users will receive SMS text
notifications about their appointment, including appointment details and the
meeting join link so they can join directly from mobile. Text notifications are
sent for appointment confirmation, updates, and a reminder 15 minutes before
the appointment begins. This is available in US only at this time.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Pre-pin meeting apps via Admin Policy in the Teams admin center
CurrentVersion.description:
Admins can now pre-pin meetings apps for users (much
like personal apps and messaging extensions) in the Teams admin center

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Pre-pin meeting apps via Admin Policy in the Teams admin center
OldVersion.description:
Admins can now pre-pin meetings apps for users (much
like personal apps and messaging extensions) in the Teams admin center

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams Rooms Pro Management improved search for rooms
CurrentVersion.description:
The
new search for rooms function in the Rooms Pro Management Portal will be
available in the room view to allow users to easily search and capture data
within small sets of rooms based on specified criteria.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams Rooms Pro Management improved search for rooms
OldVersion.description:
The
new search for rooms function in the Rooms Pro Management Portal will be
available in the room view to allow users to easily search and capture data
within small sets of rooms based on specified criteria.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Copilot (formerly Bing Chat Enterprise)
CurrentVersion.description:
,Copilot gives your organization protected AI chat for the web with commercial data protection for Entra ID users. With Copilot, user and business data are protected and will not leak outside the organization. What goes in—and comes out—remains protected. Your organization’s chat data is not saved, Microsoft has no eyes-on access to it, and it is not used to train the models. Copilot with commercial data protection is available in Bing, Edge, and Windows.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/bing-chat-enterprise/

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Copilot (formerly Bing Chat Enterprise)
OldVersion.description:
,Copilot gives your organization protected AI chat for the web with commercial data protection for Entra ID users. With Copilot, user and business data are protected and will not leak outside the organization. What goes in—and comes out—remains protected. Your organization’s chat data is not saved, Microsoft has no eyes-on access to it, and it is not used to train the models. Copilot with commercial data protection is available in Bing, Edge, and Windows.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/bing-chat-enterprise/

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Additional manager-controlled privacy settings in Shifts
CurrentVersion.description: We are releasing additional manager-controlled privacy settings in the Shifts app. Frontline managers will be able to set the level of visibility on Time off reason and notes for frontline workers and they can set how far in the past their employees can view data in schedule view, to manage employees' views of each other's breaks and notes.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Additional manager-controlled privacy settings in Shifts
OldVersion.description: We are releasing additional manager-controlled privacy settings in the Shifts app. Frontline managers will be able to set the level of visibility on Time off reason and notes for frontline workers and they can set how far in the past their employees can view data in schedule view, to manage employees' views of each other's breaks and notes.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Announcements in Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description:
Announcements allow you to create and share
time-sensitive messages in Viva Connections. You can set up, manage, and
schedule announcements from your organization’s
SharePoint home site or the Viva Connections app in Teams desktop.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Announcements in Viva Connections
OldVersion.description:
Announcements allow you to create and share
time-sensitive messages in Viva Connections. You can set up, manage, and
schedule announcements from your organization’s
SharePoint home site or the Viva Connections app in Teams desktop.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Outlook on the web - Suggested drafts with Copilot (EAP)
CurrentVersion.description: When replying to a message, Copilot can automatically give you suggestions for how to start your draft. Click any suggestion so Copilot can draft a message for you. This feature is applicable only to the Microsoft 365 Copilot Early Adoption Program (EAP).

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Outlook on the web - Suggested drafts with Copilot (EAP)
OldVersion.description: When replying to a message, Copilot can automatically give you suggestions for how to start your draft. Click any suggestion so Copilot can draft a message for you. This feature is applicable only to the Microsoft 365 Copilot Early Adoption Program (EAP).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals – Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: With Copilot in Viva Goals, user will be able to leverage AI in creating goals, summaries, and making updates in Viva Goals.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals – Copilot
OldVersion.description: With Copilot in Viva Goals, user will be able to leverage AI in creating goals, summaries, and making updates in Viva Goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: ,Viva Engage Copilot leverages LLM (Large Language Model) AI technology to provide you with personalized assistance to create engaging communications that support your professional goals.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage Copilot
OldVersion.description: ,Viva Engage Copilot leverages LLM (Large Language Model) AI technology to provide you with personalized assistance to create engaging communications that support your professional goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Refreshed landing experience for Viva Connections desktop
CurrentVersion.description: The refreshed landing experience for Viva Connections introduces several requested new features including branding capabilities, sending announcements, a revamped Resources section, and support for different card sizes. The refreshed landing experience also brings the feed back into the viewport on your Connections page and offers an improved layout to the landing page.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Refreshed landing experience for Viva Connections desktop
OldVersion.description: The refreshed landing experience for Viva Connections introduces several requested new features including branding capabilities, sending announcements, a revamped Resources section, and support for different card sizes. The refreshed landing experience also brings the feed back into the viewport on your Connections page and offers an improved layout to the landing page.

CurrentVersion.title: Word: Copilot in Word
CurrentVersion.description:
Copilot in Word transforms your writing with efficiency and creativity—create, summarize, ask questions, refine, and elevate your documents. Copilot in Word can now help you to draft content, bring in specific information from other documents into your content, generate summaries, ask questions about your document, get ideas about specific topics, and even transform text into tables or provide suggestions for ways to rewrite your content.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

OldVersion.title: Word: Copilot in Word
OldVersion.description:
Copilot in Word transforms your writing with efficiency and creativity—create, summarize, ask questions, refine, and elevate your documents. Copilot in Word can now help you to draft content, bring in specific information from other documents into your content, generate summaries, ask questions about your document, get ideas about specific topics, and even transform text into tables or provide suggestions for ways to rewrite your content.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

CurrentVersion.title: Excel: Copilot in Excel
CurrentVersion.description:
,Copilot in Excel helps you do more with your data in Excel tables by generating formula column suggestions, showing insights in charts and PivotTables, and highlighting interesting portions of data.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

OldVersion.title: Excel: Copilot in Excel
OldVersion.description:
,Copilot in Excel helps you do more with your data in Excel tables by generating formula column suggestions, showing insights in charts and PivotTables, and highlighting interesting portions of data.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

CurrentVersion.title: PowerPoint: Copilot in PowerPoint
CurrentVersion.description:
Copilot in PowerPoint is a tool that can help you create, edit and understand presentations. It can draft a presentation based on your topic or Word doc, or add slides and images for you. It can design using your template, organize your slides, and summarize and extract the main points from a longer presentation.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

OldVersion.title: PowerPoint: Copilot in PowerPoint
OldVersion.description:
Copilot in PowerPoint is a tool that can help you create, edit and understand presentations. It can draft a presentation based on your topic or Word doc, or add slides and images for you. It can design using your template, organize your slides, and summarize and extract the main points from a longer presentation.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Copilot in Outlook
CurrentVersion.description:
Copilot in Outlook helps you stay on top of your inbox and create impactful communication in a fraction of the time. Copilot can now summarize an email thread and quickly jump to the source of the summarized content, suggest action items, and draft new messages or replies. Copilot also coaches you on how to best get your message across and you can adjust the tone and length of your message. These features will be available in Outlook for Mac, web, iOS, Android, and the new Outlook for Windows.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Copilot in Outlook
OldVersion.description:
Copilot in Outlook helps you stay on top of your inbox and create impactful communication in a fraction of the time. Copilot can now summarize an email thread and quickly jump to the source of the summarized content, suggest action items, and draft new messages or replies. Copilot also coaches you on how to best get your message across and you can adjust the tone and length of your message. These features will be available in Outlook for Mac, web, iOS, Android, and the new Outlook for Windows.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Copilot in Whiteboard
CurrentVersion.description:
Copilot in Whiteboard helps you kickstart and accelerate your ideation process to generate, categorize, and summarize your ideas.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: Copilot in Whiteboard
OldVersion.description:
Copilot in Whiteboard helps you kickstart and accelerate your ideation process to generate, categorize, and summarize your ideas.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Copilot in OneNote
CurrentVersion.description:
Copilot in OneNote helps you revolutionize the way you plan and organize by staying better prepared and proactively taking action from notes. Now you can gain deeper insights on your notes by asking comprehensive questions, generating summaries of your content, asking Copilot to generate content for you, and helping make your writing clearer.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

OldVersion.title: OneNote: Copilot in OneNote
OldVersion.description:
Copilot in OneNote helps you revolutionize the way you plan and organize by staying better prepared and proactively taking action from notes. Now you can gain deeper insights on your notes by asking comprehensive questions, generating summaries of your content, asking Copilot to generate content for you, and helping make your writing clearer.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Copilot in Microsoft 365 Loop
CurrentVersion.description:
Copilot in Loop helps you unlock the power of shared thinking—co-create, get up to speed, and stay in sync with your teammates. Now you can iterate with Copilot collaboratively as a team, co-create prompts, generate tables to help organize team projects, catch up where your teammates left off, summarize page content, and generate a recap for a teammate you're handing work off to.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Copilot in Microsoft 365 Loop
OldVersion.description:
Copilot in Loop helps you unlock the power of shared thinking—co-create, get up to speed, and stay in sync with your teammates. Now you can iterate with Copilot collaboratively as a team, co-create prompts, generate tables to help organize team projects, catch up where your teammates left off, summarize page content, and generate a recap for a teammate you're handing work off to.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description:
Copilot in Microsoft Teams helps users stay organized and on top of all their information in chat, meetings, and calls, with the ability to ask Copilot any question and discover insights. Use one of the suggested prompts or enter a free text question of your own.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Microsoft Teams
OldVersion.description:
Copilot in Microsoft Teams helps users stay organized and on top of all their information in chat, meetings, and calls, with the ability to ask Copilot any question and discover insights. Use one of the suggested prompts or enter a free text question of your own.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365: Microsoft 365 Chat
CurrentVersion.description:
Your single destination to take on any task. It combines the power of Large Language Models with your work content and context, and other apps, to help you draft content, catch up on what you missed, and get answers to questions via open prompts. It's available via multiple surfaces, including microsoft365.com, Teams, and Bing.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365: Microsoft 365 Chat
OldVersion.description:
Your single destination to take on any task. It combines the power of Large Language Models with your work content and context, and other apps, to help you draft content, catch up on what you missed, and get answers to questions via open prompts. It's available via multiple surfaces, including microsoft365.com, Teams, and Bing.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Workflows in Chat
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to configure workflows within their Teams chats. Available only in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Workflows in Chat
OldVersion.description: Users will be able to configure workflows within their Teams chats. Available only in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Classic Outlook for Windows - Summarize by Copilot
CurrentVersion.description:
Copilot combines the power of LLMs and Outlook data to help you do more. Copilot can summarize email threads and extract key points.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Classic Outlook for Windows - Summarize by Copilot
OldVersion.description:
Copilot combines the power of LLMs and Outlook data to help you do more. Copilot can summarize email threads and extract key points.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - File Name and File Path filters for DLP alerts in Microsoft 365 Defender portal
CurrentVersion.description:
,We are enhancing the filtering experience for DLP alerts in Microsoft
365 Defender portal with the capability to filter the DLP alerts queues
by File Name or File Path.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - File Name and File Path filters for DLP alerts in Microsoft 365 Defender portal
OldVersion.description:
,We are enhancing the filtering experience for DLP alerts in Microsoft
365 Defender portal with the capability to filter the DLP alerts queues
by File Name or File Path.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Clipchamp content
CurrentVersion.description: Content improves your ability to create engaging and inspiring videos using Clipchamp. This feature includes stock videos and images, music, shapes, graphics and annotations and is available via web only for the following Microsoft 365 SKUs: Microsoft 365 E3, Microsoft 365 E5, Microsoft 365 Business Standard, and Microsoft 365 Business Premium.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Clipchamp content
OldVersion.description: Content improves your ability to create engaging and inspiring videos using Clipchamp. This feature includes stock videos and images, music, shapes, graphics and annotations and is available via web only for the following Microsoft 365 SKUs: Microsoft 365 E3, Microsoft 365 E5, Microsoft 365 Business Standard, and Microsoft 365 Business Premium.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Staged Rollout for Graph Connectors
CurrentVersion.description:
Staged rollout is a feature that allows you to gradually introduce
Microsoft Graph connectors to a select group of users in your production
environment. You can use it to deploy an existing or new connection to a
limited set of users, monitor the performance, and adjust settings as needed.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Staged Rollout for Graph Connectors
OldVersion.description:
Staged rollout is a feature that allows you to gradually introduce
Microsoft Graph connectors to a select group of users in your production
environment. You can use it to deploy an existing or new connection to a
limited set of users, monitor the performance, and adjust settings as needed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Private Line
CurrentVersion.description:
With private line, users will be able to have a private second
phone number that they can make available to a select set of callers to call
them directly, bypassing delegates, admins, or assistants. Inbound calls to the
private line will be distinguished by a unique notification and ringtone. The
private line will support incoming calls only.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Private Line
OldVersion.description:
With private line, users will be able to have a private second
phone number that they can make available to a select set of callers to call
them directly, bypassing delegates, admins, or assistants. Inbound calls to the
private line will be distinguished by a unique notification and ringtone. The
private line will support incoming calls only.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview capabilities for Microsoft 365 Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview is launching several capabilities that help with security and compliance of data in Microsoft 365 Copilot. These are capabilities in Information Protection, Data Lifecycle Management, Audit, eDiscovery, and Communication Compliance.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview capabilities for Microsoft 365 Copilot
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Purview is launching several capabilities that help with security and compliance of data in Microsoft 365 Copilot. These are capabilities in Information Protection, Data Lifecycle Management, Audit, eDiscovery, and Communication Compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Power BI: Microsoft Copilot Dashboard from Viva Insights
CurrentVersion.description:
,The
Microsoft Copilot Dashboard is a new Power BI app from Viva Insights that helps
organizational leaders prepare for rollout, and track adoption and impact of
Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365.

OldVersion.title: Power BI: Microsoft Copilot Dashboard from Viva Insights
OldVersion.description:
,The
Microsoft Copilot Dashboard is a new Power BI app from Viva Insights that helps
organizational leaders prepare for rollout, and track adoption and impact of
Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Adoption Score AI assistance category
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing a new people experiences category in Adoption Score in the Microsoft 365 admin center. The new category helps organizations understand the adoption Microsoft Copilot features in Microsoft 365.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Adoption Score AI assistance category
OldVersion.description: We are introducing a new people experiences category in Adoption Score in the Microsoft 365 admin center. The new category helps organizations understand the adoption Microsoft Copilot features in Microsoft 365.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- Out-of-box Advanced Hunting queries for Data Loss Prevention incidents in Microsoft 365 Defender
CurrentVersion.description: Organizations can click the "Go Hunt” dropdown from the DLP alert page in Microsoft 365 Defender and select from a list of pre-populated queries for common scenarios such as understanding if a file is shared externally, participants of a Teams meetings, and more.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- Out-of-box Advanced Hunting queries for Data Loss Prevention incidents in Microsoft 365 Defender
OldVersion.description: Organizations can click the "Go Hunt” dropdown from the DLP alert page in Microsoft 365 Defender and select from a list of pre-populated queries for common scenarios such as understanding if a file is shared externally, participants of a Teams meetings, and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365
CurrentVersion.description:
We will
be introducing a new Usage report covering
Copilot for Microsoft 365. The report will include two sections: readiness and
usage. The readiness section will include insights into your organization's
technical eligibility, license assignment, and Microsoft 365 usage metrics to
inform Copilot license assignment decisions. The Usage section of the report
will include total enabled and active users, Copilot usage with a breakout per
Microsoft 365 app, activity insights, and more to
follow.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365
OldVersion.description:
We will
be introducing a new Usage report covering
Copilot for Microsoft 365. The report will include two sections: readiness and
usage. The readiness section will include insights into your organization's
technical eligibility, license assignment, and Microsoft 365 usage metrics to
inform Copilot license assignment decisions. The Usage section of the report
will include total enabled and active users, Copilot usage with a breakout per
Microsoft 365 app, activity insights, and more to
follow.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for scheduled channel meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description:
Intelligent
recap is now available for scheduled channel meetings, so users can easily
browse the meeting recording by speakers and topics, as well as access
AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for scheduled channel meetings (Premium)
OldVersion.description:
Intelligent
recap is now available for scheduled channel meetings, so users can easily
browse the meeting recording by speakers and topics, as well as access
AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Full File Evidence for all workloads in Activity Explorer
CurrentVersion.description: ,This feature grants the user the capability to view the source link of the file associated with the activity flagged in Activity Explorer.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Full File Evidence for all workloads in Activity Explorer
OldVersion.description: ,This feature grants the user the capability to view the source link of the file associated with the activity flagged in Activity Explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Azure protected voicemail on Teams App
CurrentVersion.description: Teams users will now have link to their Azure protected voicemails from the Teams App. Users will get notification for the voicemail on the Teams App and can open the attached link to access the voicemail on the web browser.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Azure protected voicemail on Teams App
OldVersion.description: Teams users will now have link to their Azure protected voicemails from the Teams App. Users will get notification for the voicemail on the Teams App and can open the attached link to access the voicemail on the web browser.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New Meeting Option and Meeting Policy "Turn off copying or forwarding of meeting chat" (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: "Turn off copying or forwarding of meeting chat" is a new meeting option that gives meeting organizer the option to disable copying and sharing features on meeting chat messages for participants in order to reduce the risk of data leak. Once this restriction is enabled, meeting chat participants will not be able to copy chat messages using menu option or keyboard shortcut, forward messages or share messages to Outlook. There is also a new Meeting Policy setting in Teams admin center for admin to control whether user can see or use this feature in Meeting Options page. Admin can also set the default value for this meeting option in Meeting Templates they create.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New Meeting Option and Meeting Policy "Turn off copying or forwarding of meeting chat" (Premium)
OldVersion.description: "Turn off copying or forwarding of meeting chat" is a new meeting option that gives meeting organizer the option to disable copying and sharing features on meeting chat messages for participants in order to reduce the risk of data leak. Once this restriction is enabled, meeting chat participants will not be able to copy chat messages using menu option or keyboard shortcut, forward messages or share messages to Outlook. There is also a new Meeting Policy setting in Teams admin center for admin to control whether user can see or use this feature in Meeting Options page. Admin can also set the default value for this meeting option in Meeting Templates they create.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Planner Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Through simple, natural-language prompts, Copilot in the Planner Teams app will help you generate new plans, set goals, track status, and react to changes as projects evolve.

OldVersion.title: Planner: Planner Copilot
OldVersion.description: Through simple, natural-language prompts, Copilot in the Planner Teams app will help you generate new plans, set goals, track status, and react to changes as projects evolve.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Clipchamp Premium features
CurrentVersion.description:
Clipchamp Premium
features help users take their content to the next level. With Clipchamp
Premium, users can easily apply brand fonts, colors and logos with brand kit,
add top-tier assets for commercial use, and export crisp, well-defined visuals
as 4K, 30fps, MP4 files and access advanced analytics. Clipchamp Premium
features will be available as a standalone SKU, as well as an add-on to the following Microsoft
365 SKUs: Microsoft 365 E3, Microsoft 365 E5, Microsoft 365 Business Standard,
and Microsoft 365 Business Premium.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Clipchamp Premium features
OldVersion.description:
Clipchamp Premium
features help users take their content to the next level. With Clipchamp
Premium, users can easily apply brand fonts, colors and logos with brand kit,
add top-tier assets for commercial use, and export crisp, well-defined visuals
as 4K, 30fps, MP4 files and access advanced analytics. Clipchamp Premium
features will be available as a standalone SKU, as well as an add-on to the following Microsoft
365 SKUs: Microsoft 365 E3, Microsoft 365 E5, Microsoft 365 Business Standard,
and Microsoft 365 Business Premium.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Advanced Video Analytics for Clipchamp Premium
CurrentVersion.description:
We are building the next set of analytics features that would help video creators to better understand the audience and video viewing patterns. These features would be available as a part of the Clipchamp Premium license.

Views by geolocation: Geolocation shows the views of the video as a percentage of total views from different countries over the last 7 days, 30 days, and 90 days. 
Usage by devices: This metric shows the views of the video as a percentage of total views from different devices (desktop, mobile, etc.) over the last 7 days, 30 days, and 90 days. 
Average watch time: It represents the total playback minutes of a video across multiple sessions divided by unique sessions. It reflects the average time spent by a user while watching the video over its lifetime.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Advanced Video Analytics for Clipchamp Premium
OldVersion.description:
We are building the next set of analytics features that would help video creators to better understand the audience and video viewing patterns. These features would be available as a part of the Clipchamp Premium license.

Views by geolocation: Geolocation shows the views of the video as a percentage of total views from different countries over the last 7 days, 30 days, and 90 days. 
Usage by devices: This metric shows the views of the video as a percentage of total views from different devices (desktop, mobile, etc.) over the last 7 days, 30 days, and 90 days. 
Average watch time: It represents the total playback minutes of a video across multiple sessions divided by unique sessions. It reflects the average time spent by a user while watching the video over its lifetime.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Copilot in Stream
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Stream leverages LLM (Large Language Model) AI technology to help you quickly get the insights you need from Stream (on SharePoint) videos. With Copilot in Stream you can quickly and effectively summarize any video with a transcript, or ask deep dive questions for topics you need to understand. This feature is only available for customers who have purchased the Microsoft 365 Copilot license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Copilot in Stream
OldVersion.description: Copilot in Stream leverages LLM (Large Language Model) AI technology to help you quickly get the insights you need from Stream (on SharePoint) videos. With Copilot in Stream you can quickly and effectively summarize any video with a transcript, or ask deep dive questions for topics you need to understand. This feature is only available for customers who have purchased the Microsoft 365 Copilot license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Microsoft 365 Backup
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft 365 Backup Service is a product offering spanning across the OneDrive, SharePoint, and Exchange Online services that provides customers with a consistent, cross product solution, to recover their M365 data from cataclysmic events such as: at scale ransomware attacks, or malicious/accidental data deletion/corruption by end users. Microsoft 365 Backup Service is available on a pay-as-you-go basis and can be enabled through the Microsoft 365 admin center.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Microsoft 365 Backup
OldVersion.description: Microsoft 365 Backup Service is a product offering spanning across the OneDrive, SharePoint, and Exchange Online services that provides customers with a consistent, cross product solution, to recover their M365 data from cataclysmic events such as: at scale ransomware attacks, or malicious/accidental data deletion/corruption by end users. Microsoft 365 Backup Service is available on a pay-as-you-go basis and can be enabled through the Microsoft 365 admin center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Microsoft Graph connector results merged inline in "All" vertical for GCC and GCCH
CurrentVersion.description: Results from external data sources that are ingested with Microsoft Graph connectors will be displayed in the "All" vertical alongside content from Microsoft 365 apps and services for GCC and GCC-High.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Microsoft Graph connector results merged inline in "All" vertical for GCC and GCCH
OldVersion.description: Results from external data sources that are ingested with Microsoft Graph connectors will be displayed in the "All" vertical alongside content from Microsoft 365 apps and services for GCC and GCC-High.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - Identify OneDrive site associated with an inactive mailbox for Custodians
CurrentVersion.description: When adding a Custodian in an eDiscovery (Premium) case, the OneDrive site associated with an inactive mailbox will now be auto populated to be created as a data source. This feature will be available for Custodians added through the Ux only.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - Identify OneDrive site associated with an inactive mailbox for Custodians
OldVersion.description: When adding a Custodian in an eDiscovery (Premium) case, the OneDrive site associated with an inactive mailbox will now be auto populated to be created as a data source. This feature will be available for Custodians added through the Ux only.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Choose how many days of emails sync to your device for offline usage
CurrentVersion.description:
With the new sync window, you can choose how many days' worth of emails and attachments you want to
download to your device so you can always access them even while offline.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: To Do app opens in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Use the To Do app without leaving the new Outlook for Windows! Clicking the To Do icon in the navigation bar will open inline and will no longer open in a separate browser window.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals--Improved organization admin settings experience
CurrentVersion.description: Simplified organization admin settings page and additional organization management controls.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals--Improved organization admin settings experience
OldVersion.description: Simplified organization admin settings page and additional organization management controls.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals--Goals Bulk Import Enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: Improved bulk import of Goals experience and supporting additional fields with bulk import

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals--Goals Bulk Import Enhancements
OldVersion.description: Improved bulk import of Goals experience and supporting additional fields with bulk import

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Graph API for Teams Meeting Recordings
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Graph meeting recording API allows
developers access to Teams meeting recordings once the meeting is completed.
Recorded media output is in MP4 audio+video format.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Graph API for Teams Meeting Recordings
OldVersion.description:
Microsoft Graph meeting recording API allows
developers access to Teams meeting recordings once the meeting is completed.
Recorded media output is in MP4 audio+video format.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: iOS Web enrollment
CurrentVersion.description: Apple's device enrollment is the most common form of enrollment for BYO.  This has relied on our Company Portal app but that added extra auth prompts, app downloads, and steps.  Web Enrollment is our new streamlined BYO enrollment flow.  Leveraging JIT-registration, web enrollment is a fast and easy way for users to get productive securely.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Scope the administration of retention and retention label policies (U.S. government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: Organizations can leverage Administrative Units in Azure Active Directory to define who can configure and manage policies in Microsoft Purview. This update will include the ability to set a Records Management admin for a specific geography, department, or other unit, who can manage retention and retention label policies for their unit.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Clipchamp for work
CurrentVersion.description: Clipchamp for work accounts enables rapid editing and creation of videos on OneDrive and SharePoint including features like trim, join, transitions, filters, text overlay, audio controls, screen/camera recording and more. Available via the web only for the following Microsoft 365 SKUs: Microsoft 365 E3, Microsoft 365 E5, Microsoft 365 Business Standard, and Microsoft 365 Business Premium.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Copilot in SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: ,Copilot in SharePoint combines the power of Large Language Models (LLMs), your data in the Microsoft Graph, and best practices to create engaging web content.? Use a brief prompt to generate custom sites and pages with content hierarchy, design, and sample content that aligns with user needs. And all within our existing commitments to data security and privacy in the enterprise.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft SharePoint: Resource Specific Consent
CurrentVersion.description: Introduction of new .Selected permissions and APIs to support granting applications permissions at all of the levels where it is possible to break inheritance today. This will apply to applications operating in either delegated or app-only mode.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Application Site Creation without Sites.FullControl.All
CurrentVersion.description: Currently an application requires Sites.FullControl.All to create new site collections within a tenant. This work will allow applications to use a new scope, Sites.Create.All, to create new site collections without accessing any existing content. During the site creation process the application can request access to the new site, allowing for provisioning scenarios with reduced tenant permissions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Exact Data Match to support multi-token corroborative evidence
CurrentVersion.description: Exact Data Match (EDM) will support string match detection of multi-token (i.e., fields with multiple words separated by spaces or punctuation) corroborative evidence without requiring mapping Sensitive Information Types (SITs) to multi-token corroborative evidence fields.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Optical Character Recognition in OneDrive and SharePoint supports multi-page PDF and TIFF files
CurrentVersion.description: ,Currently, OCR is available only for standalone Images. With this update image-only PDF and TIFF files in OneDrive and SharePoint will also benefit from OCR.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage report for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 - Early Access Program (EAP)
CurrentVersion.description: The new Microsoft 365 admin center Copilot product usage report shows enabled and active user time trends across 7/30/90/180 days. This feature is applicable only to the Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 - Early Adoption Program (EAP).

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New Outlook for Windows and web - Message List Selection updates
CurrentVersion.description:
In order to save space on the message list in Outlook,
we are making a UI update: From "selection circles on the left side of
each row" to a "Select mode that you have to get into before
checkboxes appear". This affects users who don't have "Sender
Images" enabled in the Message List. If you have "Sender Images"
turned on, hovering over the images will still show the checkboxes, even if you
did not get yourself into "Select Mode". To review if you have
"Send image" enabled, go to Settings/Mail/Layout and scroll to
"Sender image".

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Decorate your background (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Create more personal and engaging backgrounds by applying advanced effects. This will only be available in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Deploy Teams at Scale for frontline with dynamic teams.
CurrentVersion.description: ,Deploy teams at scale for your frontline workers using dynamic teams in the Teams Admin Center. Dynamic teams will automate member management to ensure your teams are always up to date. Note: We are updating a release phase to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: SMS Notifications in Virtual Appointments Template (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description:
External guest users will receive SMS text
notifications about their appointment, including appointment details and the
meeting join link so they can join directly from mobile. Text notifications are
sent for appointment confirmation, updates, and a reminder 15 minutes before
the appointment begins. This is available in US only at this time.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Pre-pin meeting apps via Admin Policy in the Teams admin center
CurrentVersion.description:
Admins can now pre-pin meetings apps for users (much
like personal apps and messaging extensions) in the Teams admin center

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams Rooms Pro Management improved search for rooms
CurrentVersion.description:
The
new search for rooms function in the Rooms Pro Management Portal will be
available in the room view to allow users to easily search and capture data
within small sets of rooms based on specified criteria.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Copilot (formerly Bing Chat Enterprise)
CurrentVersion.description:
,Copilot gives your organization protected AI chat for the web with commercial data protection for Entra ID users. With Copilot, user and business data are protected and will not leak outside the organization. What goes in—and comes out—remains protected. Your organization’s chat data is not saved, Microsoft has no eyes-on access to it, and it is not used to train the models. Copilot with commercial data protection is available in Bing, Edge, and Windows.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/bing-chat-enterprise/

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Additional manager-controlled privacy settings in Shifts
CurrentVersion.description: We are releasing additional manager-controlled privacy settings in the Shifts app. Frontline managers will be able to set the level of visibility on Time off reason and notes for frontline workers and they can set how far in the past their employees can view data in schedule view, to manage employees' views of each other's breaks and notes.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Announcements in Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description:
Announcements allow you to create and share
time-sensitive messages in Viva Connections. You can set up, manage, and
schedule announcements from your organization’s
SharePoint home site or the Viva Connections app in Teams desktop.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Outlook on the web - Suggested drafts with Copilot (EAP)
CurrentVersion.description: When replying to a message, Copilot can automatically give you suggestions for how to start your draft. Click any suggestion so Copilot can draft a message for you. This feature is applicable only to the Microsoft 365 Copilot Early Adoption Program (EAP).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals – Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: With Copilot in Viva Goals, user will be able to leverage AI in creating goals, summaries, and making updates in Viva Goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: ,Viva Engage Copilot leverages LLM (Large Language Model) AI technology to provide you with personalized assistance to create engaging communications that support your professional goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Refreshed landing experience for Viva Connections desktop
CurrentVersion.description: The refreshed landing experience for Viva Connections introduces several requested new features including branding capabilities, sending announcements, a revamped Resources section, and support for different card sizes. The refreshed landing experience also brings the feed back into the viewport on your Connections page and offers an improved layout to the landing page.

CurrentVersion.title: Word: Copilot in Word
CurrentVersion.description:
Copilot in Word transforms your writing with efficiency and creativity—create, summarize, ask questions, refine, and elevate your documents. Copilot in Word can now help you to draft content, bring in specific information from other documents into your content, generate summaries, ask questions about your document, get ideas about specific topics, and even transform text into tables or provide suggestions for ways to rewrite your content.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

CurrentVersion.title: Excel: Copilot in Excel
CurrentVersion.description:
,Copilot in Excel helps you do more with your data in Excel tables by generating formula column suggestions, showing insights in charts and PivotTables, and highlighting interesting portions of data.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

CurrentVersion.title: PowerPoint: Copilot in PowerPoint
CurrentVersion.description:
Copilot in PowerPoint is a tool that can help you create, edit and understand presentations. It can draft a presentation based on your topic or Word doc, or add slides and images for you. It can design using your template, organize your slides, and summarize and extract the main points from a longer presentation.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Copilot in Outlook
CurrentVersion.description:
Copilot in Outlook helps you stay on top of your inbox and create impactful communication in a fraction of the time. Copilot can now summarize an email thread and quickly jump to the source of the summarized content, suggest action items, and draft new messages or replies. Copilot also coaches you on how to best get your message across and you can adjust the tone and length of your message. These features will be available in Outlook for Mac, web, iOS, Android, and the new Outlook for Windows.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Copilot in Whiteboard
CurrentVersion.description:
Copilot in Whiteboard helps you kickstart and accelerate your ideation process to generate, categorize, and summarize your ideas.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Copilot in OneNote
CurrentVersion.description:
Copilot in OneNote helps you revolutionize the way you plan and organize by staying better prepared and proactively taking action from notes. Now you can gain deeper insights on your notes by asking comprehensive questions, generating summaries of your content, asking Copilot to generate content for you, and helping make your writing clearer.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Copilot in Microsoft 365 Loop
CurrentVersion.description:
Copilot in Loop helps you unlock the power of shared thinking—co-create, get up to speed, and stay in sync with your teammates. Now you can iterate with Copilot collaboratively as a team, co-create prompts, generate tables to help organize team projects, catch up where your teammates left off, summarize page content, and generate a recap for a teammate you're handing work off to.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description:
Copilot in Microsoft Teams helps users stay organized and on top of all their information in chat, meetings, and calls, with the ability to ask Copilot any question and discover insights. Use one of the suggested prompts or enter a free text question of your own.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365: Microsoft 365 Chat
CurrentVersion.description:
Your single destination to take on any task. It combines the power of Large Language Models with your work content and context, and other apps, to help you draft content, catch up on what you missed, and get answers to questions via open prompts. It's available via multiple surfaces, including microsoft365.com, Teams, and Bing.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Workflows in Chat
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to configure workflows within their Teams chats. Available only in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Classic Outlook for Windows - Summarize by Copilot
CurrentVersion.description:
Copilot combines the power of LLMs and Outlook data to help you do more. Copilot can summarize email threads and extract key points.
More info: https://adoption.microsoft.com/copilot

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - File Name and File Path filters for DLP alerts in Microsoft 365 Defender portal
CurrentVersion.description:
,We are enhancing the filtering experience for DLP alerts in Microsoft
365 Defender portal with the capability to filter the DLP alerts queues
by File Name or File Path.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Clipchamp content
CurrentVersion.description: Content improves your ability to create engaging and inspiring videos using Clipchamp. This feature includes stock videos and images, music, shapes, graphics and annotations and is available via web only for the following Microsoft 365 SKUs: Microsoft 365 E3, Microsoft 365 E5, Microsoft 365 Business Standard, and Microsoft 365 Business Premium.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Staged Rollout for Graph Connectors
CurrentVersion.description:
Staged rollout is a feature that allows you to gradually introduce
Microsoft Graph connectors to a select group of users in your production
environment. You can use it to deploy an existing or new connection to a
limited set of users, monitor the performance, and adjust settings as needed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Private Line
CurrentVersion.description:
With private line, users will be able to have a private second
phone number that they can make available to a select set of callers to call
them directly, bypassing delegates, admins, or assistants. Inbound calls to the
private line will be distinguished by a unique notification and ringtone. The
private line will support incoming calls only.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview capabilities for Microsoft 365 Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview is launching several capabilities that help with security and compliance of data in Microsoft 365 Copilot. These are capabilities in Information Protection, Data Lifecycle Management, Audit, eDiscovery, and Communication Compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Power BI: Microsoft Copilot Dashboard from Viva Insights
CurrentVersion.description:
,The
Microsoft Copilot Dashboard is a new Power BI app from Viva Insights that helps
organizational leaders prepare for rollout, and track adoption and impact of
Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Adoption Score AI assistance category
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing a new people experiences category in Adoption Score in the Microsoft 365 admin center. The new category helps organizations understand the adoption Microsoft Copilot features in Microsoft 365.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- Out-of-box Advanced Hunting queries for Data Loss Prevention incidents in Microsoft 365 Defender
CurrentVersion.description: Organizations can click the "Go Hunt” dropdown from the DLP alert page in Microsoft 365 Defender and select from a list of pre-populated queries for common scenarios such as understanding if a file is shared externally, participants of a Teams meetings, and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365
CurrentVersion.description:
We will
be introducing a new Usage report covering
Copilot for Microsoft 365. The report will include two sections: readiness and
usage. The readiness section will include insights into your organization's
technical eligibility, license assignment, and Microsoft 365 usage metrics to
inform Copilot license assignment decisions. The Usage section of the report
will include total enabled and active users, Copilot usage with a breakout per
Microsoft 365 app, activity insights, and more to
follow.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for scheduled channel meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description:
Intelligent
recap is now available for scheduled channel meetings, so users can easily
browse the meeting recording by speakers and topics, as well as access
AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Full File Evidence for all workloads in Activity Explorer
CurrentVersion.description: ,This feature grants the user the capability to view the source link of the file associated with the activity flagged in Activity Explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Azure protected voicemail on Teams App
CurrentVersion.description: Teams users will now have link to their Azure protected voicemails from the Teams App. Users will get notification for the voicemail on the Teams App and can open the attached link to access the voicemail on the web browser.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New Meeting Option and Meeting Policy "Turn off copying or forwarding of meeting chat" (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: "Turn off copying or forwarding of meeting chat" is a new meeting option that gives meeting organizer the option to disable copying and sharing features on meeting chat messages for participants in order to reduce the risk of data leak. Once this restriction is enabled, meeting chat participants will not be able to copy chat messages using menu option or keyboard shortcut, forward messages or share messages to Outlook. There is also a new Meeting Policy setting in Teams admin center for admin to control whether user can see or use this feature in Meeting Options page. Admin can also set the default value for this meeting option in Meeting Templates they create.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Planner Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Through simple, natural-language prompts, Copilot in the Planner Teams app will help you generate new plans, set goals, track status, and react to changes as projects evolve.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Clipchamp Premium features
CurrentVersion.description:
Clipchamp Premium
features help users take their content to the next level. With Clipchamp
Premium, users can easily apply brand fonts, colors and logos with brand kit,
add top-tier assets for commercial use, and export crisp, well-defined visuals
as 4K, 30fps, MP4 files and access advanced analytics. Clipchamp Premium
features will be available as a standalone SKU, as well as an add-on to the following Microsoft
365 SKUs: Microsoft 365 E3, Microsoft 365 E5, Microsoft 365 Business Standard,
and Microsoft 365 Business Premium.

CurrentVersion.description:
We are building the next set of analytics features that would help video creators to better understand the audience and video viewing patterns. These features would be available as a part of the Clipchamp Premium license.

Views by geolocation: Geolocation shows the views of the video as a percentage of total views from different countries over the last 7 days, 30 days, and 90 days. 
Usage by devices: This metric shows the views of the video as a percentage of total views from different devices (desktop, mobile, etc.) over the last 7 days, 30 days, and 90 days. 
Average watch time: It represents the total playback minutes of a video across multiple sessions divided by unique sessions. It reflects the average time spent by a user while watching the video over its lifetime.

CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Stream leverages LLM (Large Language Model) AI technology to help you quickly get the insights you need from Stream (on SharePoint) videos. With Copilot in Stream you can quickly and effectively summarize any video with a transcript, or ask deep dive questions for topics you need to understand. This feature is only available for customers who have purchased the Microsoft 365 Copilot license.

CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft 365 Backup Service is a product offering spanning across the OneDrive, SharePoint, and Exchange Online services that provides customers with a consistent, cross product solution, to recover their M365 data from cataclysmic events such as: at scale ransomware attacks, or malicious/accidental data deletion/corruption by end users. Microsoft 365 Backup Service is available on a pay-as-you-go basis and can be enabled through the Microsoft 365 admin center.

CurrentVersion.description: Results from external data sources that are ingested with Microsoft Graph connectors will be displayed in the "All" vertical alongside content from Microsoft 365 apps and services for GCC and GCC-High.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - Identify OneDrive site associated with an inactive mailbox for Custodians
CurrentVersion.description: When adding a Custodian in an eDiscovery (Premium) case, the OneDrive site associated with an inactive mailbox will now be auto populated to be created as a data source. This feature will be available for Custodians added through the Ux only.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Choose how many days of emails sync to your device for offline usage
CurrentVersion.description:
With the new sync window, you can choose how many days' worth of emails and attachments you want to
download to your device so you can always access them even while offline.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: To Do app opens in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Use the To Do app without leaving the new Outlook for Windows! Clicking the To Do icon in the navigation bar will open inline and will no longer open in a separate browser window.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals--Improved organization admin settings experience
CurrentVersion.description: Simplified organization admin settings page and additional organization management controls.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals--Goals Bulk Import Enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: Improved bulk import of Goals experience and supporting additional fields with bulk import

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Graph API for Teams Meeting Recordings
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Graph meeting recording API allows
developers access to Teams meeting recordings once the meeting is completed.
Recorded media output is in MP4 audio+video format.
